member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect
member.summary: Contains a configurable effect that supports alpha testing.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.#ctor(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.GraphicsDevice)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.Alpha
member.summary: Gets or sets the material alpha which determines its transparency. Range is between 1 (fully opaque) and 0 (fully transparent).
member.returns: Material's alpha value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.AlphaFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the compare function for alpha test. The default value is Greater.
member.returns: The comparison function.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.DiffuseColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the diffuse color for a material, the range of color values is from 0 to 1.
member.returns: The material's diffuse color.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.FogColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the fog color, the range of color values is from 0 to 1.
member.returns: The fog color.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.FogEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the fog enable flag.
member.returns: True to enable fog; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.FogEnd
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum z value for fog.
member.returns: The distance from the camera to stop adding fog, in world space.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.FogStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum z value for fog.
member.returns: The distance from the camera to begin adding fog, in world space.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.Projection
member.summary: Gets or sets the projection matrix.
member.returns: A matrix that contains the projection transform.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.ReferenceAlpha
member.summary: Gets or sets the reference alpha value, the default value is 0.
member.returns: The reference alpha value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.Texture
member.summary: Gets or sets the current texture.
member.returns: The current texture.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.VertexColorEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether vertex color is enabled.
member.returns: True to enable per-vertex color; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.View
member.summary: Gets or sets the view matrix.
member.returns: A matrix that contains the view transform.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.AlphaTestEffect.World
member.summary: Gets or sets the world matrix.
member.returns: A matrix that contains the world transform.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect
member.summary: Contains a basic rendering effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.#ctor(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.GraphicsDevice)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.Alpha
member.summary: Gets or sets the material alpha which determines its transparency. Range is between 1 (fully opaque) and 0 (fully transparent).
member.returns: The alpha of this effect material.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.AmbientLightColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the ambient color for a light, the range of color values is from 0 to 1.
member.returns: The ambient light color of this effect. Valid values are between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.DiffuseColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the diffuse color for a material, the range of color values is from 0 to 1.
member.returns: The diffuse color of this effect material. Valid values are between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.DirectionalLight0
member.summary: Gets the first directional light for this effect.
member.returns: A directional light for this effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.DirectionalLight1
member.summary: Gets the second directional light for this effect.
member.returns: A directional light for this effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.DirectionalLight2
member.summary: Gets the third directional light for this effect.
member.returns: A directional light for this effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.EmissiveColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the emissive color for a material, the range of color values is from 0 to 1.
member.returns: The emissive color of the effect material.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.EnableDefaultLighting
member.summary: Enables default lighting for this effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.FogColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the fog color, the range of color values is from 0 to 1.
member.returns: A three-component color.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.FogEnabled
member.summary: Enables fog.
member.returns: True to enable fog; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.FogEnd
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum z value for fog.
member.returns: The distance from the camera to stop adding fog, in world space.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.FogStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum z value for fog.
member.returns: The distance from the camera to begin adding fog, in world space.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.LightingEnabled
member.summary: Enables lighting for this effect.
member.returns: true to enable lighting; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.PreferPerPixelLighting
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating that per-pixel lighting should be used if it is available for the current adapter. Per-pixel lighting is available if a graphics adapter supports Pixel Shader Model 2.0.
member.returns: true to use per-pixel lighting if it is available; false to disable per-pixel lighting. The default value is true. When is true, if the graphics adapter does not support a minimum of Pixel Shader Model 2.0, will automatically fall-back to per-vertex lighting. When is false, per-vertex lighting is used regardless of whether per-pixel lighting is supported by the graphics adapter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.Projection
member.summary: Gets or sets the projection matrix. Use this matrix to change how a 3D image is converted to a 2D image that is rendered to the computer screen.
member.returns: The projection matrix.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.SpecularColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the specular color for a material, the range of color values is from 0 to 1.
member.returns: The specular color of this effect material. Valid values are between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.SpecularPower
member.summary: Gets or sets the specular power of this effect material.
member.returns: The specular power of this effect material.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.Texture
member.summary: Gets or sets a texture to be applied by this effect.
member.returns: Texture to be applied by this effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.TextureEnabled
member.summary: Enables textures for this effect.
member.returns: true to enable textures; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.VertexColorEnabled
member.summary: Enables use vertex colors for this effect.
member.returns: true to enable vertex colors; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.View
member.summary: Gets or sets the view matrix. Use this matrix to change the position and direction of the camera.
member.returns: The view matrix.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.BasicEffect.World
member.summary: Gets or sets the world matrix. Use this matrix to change the position of the model, using world coordinates.
member.returns: The world matrix.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.ViewportExtensions
member.summary: Defines the window dimensions of a render-target surface onto which a 3D volume projects.
